channel.title: Few questions
channel.description:
hey a few questions about moparscape 3.2 /w aryan(downloaded)
1. y dont u use wepons right how they r supposed to be? 2. y dont the armor protect u like its supposed to. 3. how do i like spawn mobs so i can fight em? and 4. how do i change my characters appearence?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 04:15:45 AM[/size][hr]heh xD need help plz

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @AdrianTepes AdrianTepes
item.description:
@AdrianTepes wrote:

but i dont know howwwwwwwww to code i told u i wanna know how, and wat about the weps and armor? those dont work fully right anyway, i mean with out em i hit like 10 max on guards but with like d hally(attacks 1 handed btw) and glory ammy, i can kill in 1 hit, so something dont work right and i wanna fix it so it does work

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @rick_ro rick ro$$
item.description:
@rick_ro wrote:

when you go on moparscape when it’s like 127.0.0 or something and your on a 1 player server you cannot use magic. even with runes. for the spawning npcs kevin was right just keep doing ::npc or get a source and code it if you want a real lot.

Read full topic

that reeealy helps -sarcasm- i wanna know how though, and use magic spells lol

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

  1. speak correct grammar
  2. you must fix them self
  3. same as above
  4. npc NPCID
  5. its not usually in hybridscape don’t use moparscapes default because you can’t code everything in it… but on every other(often) open source servers can you do that on

Read full topic
